page.title: 18ST.JOSEPH'S SCHOOL, GOOLE
page.content: St.Joseph's Roman{Catholic}Primary School was opened in 1980 and is the most recently built school in Goole. Our{school}is the only one with pupils aged from 5 to 11, all the other first schools transfer their children at the age of 9. Our school was built where a playing field and some allotments used to be. There is still a playing field big enough for 3 rounders pitches, a running track and a large playground. Inside, we have a big hall for P.E. and assemblies, 5 areas where we have lessons and a library. There are 100 children in our school and we do lots of{interesting}things. For example, this term we have grown plants and put them in tubs and flower beds all round the school to make it more attractive.
